text: <!channel>: AVP ANNOUNCEMENT! If anyone is interested in volunteering to support our amazing Hood to Coast team you can earn some AVP hours! Hood to Coast is August 26 through 27th. Volunteers can sign up to do things like man water stations, give directions, assisting with team check-ins.  More info about volunteering can be found here: <http://hoodtocoastrelay.com/volunteer>
We can only have 2 team volunteers so first come first serve. Let me know by the end of the day if you’re interested!
Is the actual team set yet?
<@U1HKQRLMR>: I think we need one more! I’m the only lady too!
I’ll do it…. I just might die lol.
<@U1HKQRLMR>: you wanna run!?! We do need one more runner!
